title: Newly Renovated Modern 1 Bed / 1 Bath Apartment
posting_body: 1 Bed - 1 Bath Apartment for Rent in Cleveland | Beautifully Renovated! - Rental Terms:
- Pets allowed with a $200 non-refundable fee upfront and $25 per month (Some breed restrictions apply).
This beautifully renovated apartment unit for rent features 1 large bedroom, 1 full bathroom, and offers approximately 950 square feet of living space.
Every single thing in this apartment is brand new!
Beautiful and modern living room with new flooring and a new ceiling fan.

Fully updated eat-in kitchen with new wood cabinets which have soft close drawers, new hardware, new countertops, new sink, new faucet with sprayer, new stainless steel refrigerator, new stainless steel range, new light fixtures, and new flooring.
The stunning, modern newly renovated bathroom features new flooring, new bathtub with new tile tub surround, new shower fixture, new wood vanity with new sink and new faucet, and a new mirror.
The bedroom has new flooring, new ceiling fan, and a closet.
- Newly renovated, modern on-site laundry with new washing machines and new dryers
3306 Bosworth Road is an amazing 4 story, all brick apartment building located in the West Boulevard neighborhood in Cleveland, Ohio.
